name: VG_Legal_Docs_Report
query: SELECT (tsld.name)"Sr_No:Link/VG_Legal_Doc:100", tbm.branch_short_name AS Branch_Name, tsld.licence_number AS Licence_Number, tsld.licence_name AS Licence_Name, tsld.renewal_date AS Renewal_date, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(tsld.renewal_date, CURDATE()) < 10 THEN CONCAT('', DATEDIFF(tsld.renewal_date, CURDATE()), '') ELSE DATEDIFF(tsld.renewal_date, CURDATE()) END AS Remain_Days, tsld.c_per_name AS Contact_Name, tsld.c_per_num AS Contact_Number, tsld.contact_address AS Contact_Address, tsld.remarks FROM `tabVG_Legal_Doc` tsld LEFT JOIN `tabBranch_Master` tbm ON tbm.name = tsld.branch_name -- ORDER BY CAST (DATEDIFF(tsld.renewal_date, CURDATE()) as INT) Asc; ORDER BY DATEDIFF(tsld.renewal_date, CURDATE()) Asc;
